item.description:

item.title: Sentient Launches Open Deep Search (ODS), Surpassing Perplexity
item.description: Open Deep Search (ODS), a milestone in open-source AI, has been launched by decentralized AI developer Sentient. Open Deep Search improves the capabilities of Sentient Chat, a powerful, user-friendly chatbot with a 1.75 million+ waitlist that can surpass Perplexity. Now, Sentient Chat will start using ODS to provide unparalleled AI search capabilities.

item.title: [$] LWN.net Weekly Edition for April 3, 2025
item.description:
Inside this week's LWN.net Weekly Edition:

  • Front: Calibre 8.0; Fedora reproducibility; OpenWrt One; 6.15 Merge Window; LSFMM+BPF coverage including BPF in GCC, Rust merging process, and more.
  • Briefs: Ubuntu namespaces; New FPL; PorteuX 2.0; Firefox 137.0; GCC Rust; Rockbox 4.0; Rust specification; Thundermail; Dave Täht RIP; Quotes; ...
  • Announcements: Newsletters, conferences, security updates, patches, and more.

item.title: Legacy Stripe API Exploited to Validate Stolen Payment Cards in Web Skimmer Campaign
item.description:
Threat hunters are warning of a sophisticated web skimmer campaign that leverages a legacy application programming interface (API) from payment processor Stripe to validate stolen payment information prior to exfiltration.
"This tactic ensures that only valid card data is sent to the attackers, making the operation more efficient and potentially harder to detect," Jscrambler researchers Pedro

item.title: Europol Dismantles Kidflix With 72,000 CSAM Videos Seized in Major Operation
item.description:
In one of the largest coordinated law enforcement operations, authorities have dismantled Kidflix, a streaming platform that offered child sexual abuse material (CSAM).

item.title: Google Patches Quick Share Vulnerability Enabling Silent File Transfers Without Consent
item.description:
